about_the_game:
Coming soon - Follow for updates on the game!


Grow your store and become the best store manager in the city! Third person or VR, interact with AI with voice commands or simply beat them up for robbing your store!

About the game


As a new store manager, your job is to grow your business! But be warry, some customers might not be so nice. Inside the VR world, use business management mechanics to serve your customers and defend your mart from evildoers and robbers.

Features included


  • Loyal customers with shopping list that are ready to spend big money
  • Thieves, here to buy and maybe slip a few things down their pockets...
  • Speech detection - Talk to the AI using key words to trigger certain responses (microphone required for the feature)
  • Cops are here to help you protect the shop - and maybe take some bribes...
  • Inventory management - Make sure to have stock, purchase your goods and decide on what price to sell at.
  • Advertise your shop! Decorate and create deals to attract customers and increase sales!
  • Clean your store! Use that mop to pick up messes and dirt, you wouldn't want someone to get hurt and sue you!
  • Use that money! Reinvest in new products, or upgrade your security system to protect your store!
  • Multiplayer feature - team up with up to 3 teammates to help manage the store (over Steam or LAN)
